name: Cyber Chicken
description: Cyber Chicken is 2.5D adventure featuring 8', 375 pounds of cybernetic poultry as a futuristic killing machine on a quixotic mission to save the World. The game features fun combat, classic platforming, outrageous humor, rocking soundtrack and a fully upgradeable Cyber Chicken arsenal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460, AMD Radeon HD 4850 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 500, AMD Radeon HD 5000 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
